akn:section.akn:heading: Collection, analysis, and dissemination of workforce data

akn:content.akn:p: (c) Updates Not later than March 31 of each year, the Director of National Intelligence shall provide a report (which may be provided as part of an annual report required under another provision of law) to the workforce of the intelligence community (including senior leadership), the public, and the appropriate congressional committees that includes—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Expand the collection and analysis of voluntary applicant flow data

akn:content.akn:p: (d) Expand the collection and analysis of voluntary applicant flow data

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Identify additional categories for voluntary data collection of current employees

akn:content.akn:p: (e) Identify additional categories for voluntary data collection of current employees
